DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics PF-04958242 number single ascend dos healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Study To Evaluate The Safety , Tolerability And Pharmacokinetics Of Single Doses Of PF-04958242 In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy female subject nonchildbearing potential and/or male subject age 18 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 55 kg Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Other severe acute chronic medical psychiatric condition laboratory abnormality may increase risk associate study participation investigational product administration may interfere interpretation study result , judgment investigator , would make subject inappropriate entry study .
